comments: The Bryologist P.V.Sane (fl. 1942) is different from: Prafullachandra Vishnu Sane (1937- ), a plant physiologist
examples: Aspiromitus khandalensis Apte & Sane, J. Univ. Bombay 10: 80. 1942
source: Missouri Bryological list; Index Herbariorum; Fl. date & Name example from: Subir Bandyopadhyay (CAL) (via P. Lakshminarasimhan (CAL))
